metadata.title: YOUFENG Sterling Silver Love Heart Locket Necklace That Holds Pictures Engraved I Love You to the Moon and Back Photo Lockets

❤DESIGN CONCEPT❤: Platinum Plated creates glamorous reflections and adds a luxurious look to this necklace.
❤Seller Warranty❤: 90-Day Money Back Guarantee or Exchange,and if you have any question, please be free to contact us!
description: ❤ Sterling Silver locket necklace, "I Love You to the Moon and Back" engraved love heart locket necklace, that holds pictures, could be sent as a Christmas gift, Valentine's Day gift, Mother's Day gift, Birthday gift, Wedding Anniversary gift. Fit every women and girl.

They don't need to use very expensive maintenance water, just to avoid acid-base and moist environment.
Don't wear when shower, washing face, sweating, deposit before application of dry cloth to wipe dry; When jewelry don't wear should be placed into the box which has desiccant inside.

1.Jewelry often replaced, the same piece of jewelry, should avoid wearing long time,especially in hot summer,jewelry coating easy to corrosion when long-term contact sweat,so it is best to prepare several pieces as replacements. 2.Easy to damage when Exposure with chemicals, Bathed in the fragrance, chlorine in swimming,And the salt water of the sea,all will cause etch to jewelry plating,so should remove all before a bath or swim. 3.Don't overlap, Collision chafed,should be stored in the original packaging or in the box of the independent small grid,avoid to scraping surface. 4.Regularly clean jewelry,choose soft hair brush sweep clean the surface to remove surface stains.
